page.title: 17THE DOWN HOTEL
page.content:
The{Down Hotel}is over 100 years old. When it was called the{Unicorn}it used to be a beer house, where you could only buy beer.There are about 20 rooms, including the bedrooms.{Mr {Lineham}lives at the{Down Hotel}now, named as it is after the{Down}area locally. Mr Lineham will have been at the{Down Hotel}one year in November.He has about 7 deliveries a week, plus the milkman daily.You could fit about 400 people in the{Down Hotel,}which is a free house. Mr Lineham said there is supposed to be a ghost. The car park can hold about 120 cars. Up to 300 people come in on the busiest night, Saturday. There have been five owners of the{Down,}and before that others who owned the{Unicorn.
